attributes.action: olympic amnesty for tv at work
attributes.additional_details: To have an amnesty for the need to have a tv liscence to watch tv at work during the olympics & paralympics. Once in a lifetime "peoples olympics" in United Kingdom and the majority of working people will not be able to watch them live. subject to employers consent i would like people who have got a tv liscence at home to be able to take it to work without fear of prosecution for the duration of the olympiss & paralympics. Simple, easy, just needs the government to make an announcement -nice touch for the working people from a government who proclaim to be "in touch with the people".
